Title: Episode #1.10
Writer: Joe Penhall (created by), John Douglas (based upon the book by), Mark Olshaker (based upon the book by), Joe Penhall (teleplay by), Jennifer Haley (teleplay by), Joe Penhall (story by)
Actors: Jonathan Groff, Holt McCallany, Joe Tuttle, Duke Lafoon
Plot: The team cracks under the pressure from an in-house review. Holden's bold style elicits a confession but puts his career, relationships and health at risk.
